keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide more policemen and antisocial behaviour powers for our towns and villages.
Protect our countryside against development and ensure we build in the right places.
Champion local Sussex wines, High Streets stores etc.
Invest in local hospitals and GP services, enabled by strong economy.
Build faster, more frequent, and reliable train services in the area.

issues.environment: Protect our countryside against development and ensure we build in the right places.
